Klasse TaskManager

java.lang.Object
Project.logic.TaskManager
public class TaskManager extends Object
The TaskManager class is responsible for managing a collection of tasks. It provides functionality for adding, removing, updating, filtering, and sorting tasks.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • TaskManager

      public TaskManager()

  • Methodendetails

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task task)
      Adds a new task to the task manager.
      Parameter:
      task - A Task to be added to the task manager.

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask(String title) throws InvalidTaskException
      Removes a task with the specified title from the task manager.
      Parameter:
      title - A String representing the title of the task to be removed.
      Löst aus:
      InvalidTaskException - if no task with the specified title is found.

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(String title, String newTitle, String description, int priority, LocalDate dueDate) throws InvalidTaskException
      Updates the details of a task with the specified title.
      Parameter:
      title - A String representing the title of the task to be updated.
      newTitle - A String representing the new title for the task.
      description - A String representing the updated description of the task.
      priority - An int representing the updated priority level of the task.
      dueDate - A LocalDate representing the updated due date of the task.
      Löst aus:
      InvalidTaskException - if no task with the specified title is found.

    • markTaskAsCompleted

      public void markTaskAsCompleted(String title) throws InvalidTaskException
      Marks a task with the specified title as completed.
      Parameter:
      title - A String representing the title of the task to mark as completed.
      Löst aus:
      InvalidTaskException - if no task with the specified title is found.

    • getTasks

      public List<Task> getTasks(String filter, String sortBy)
      Retrieves a list of tasks based on the specified filter and sorting criteria.
      Parameter:
      filter - A String representing the category to filter tasks by (e.g., "work", "personal"). If null, no filtering is applied.
      sortBy - A String representing the sorting criterion ("priority" or "dueDate").
      Gibt zurück:
      A List<Task> of tasks that match the filter and sorting criteria.
